# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.crt$
\.csr$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.key$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.password$
\.pem$
\.png$
\.wav$
^nebula2/common/
^nebula2/fbthrift/
^nebula2/graph/
^nebula2/meta/
^nebula2/storage/
^\.github/
